entry.title: mid-year update
entry.content:
Happy summer.

Itâ€™s roughly half-time for this year and hence, besides planning to enjoy music at the FÃªte de la musique, now is a good time to reflect on my 2023 goals.

Letâ€™s annotate my personal objectives. For the details, Iâ€™ll refer you to the relevant blog post:

  • ğŸµ learning the Ukulele
    • I would say Iâ€™m on a good path to achieve this goal

  • ğŸ–Šï¸ write roughly a substantial article per month
    • Iâ€™m definitely late on this one. The Ukulele took most of my spare time.
  • ğŸ“· a photo-roll with around 30 photos Iâ€™m proud of

  • ğŸ’» a number of improvements to the blog-engine:
    • Iâ€™m also on a good path to achieve this goal. KitchenSink now has been documented in depth, and recently got the support for hashtags. Yay #goals .
    • I also have a PoC working for the federation-mode for the explorer but itâ€™s probably bitrotten already.
  • ğŸ‘” work-wise Iâ€™d like Echoes to jump in adoption to move to the next phase

In summary, apart from the writing on this very blog, Iâ€™m doing quite ok on night-owl activities. I have enough draft material and ideas for a few articles already. What remains is time-budgetting.
entry.summary: Happy summer! reflecting on my yearly goals.
